hero.title: Smart Monitoring for Liquor Production
hero.subtitle: Real-time control of critical parameters like temperature, humidity, and pressure in fermentation, distillation, and maturation processes.

about.title: About WineSoft
about.description1: WineSoft is a comprehensive smart monitoring solution designed specifically for liquor production facilities. Our platform combines cutting-edge IoT technology with industry expertise to deliver real-time insights and control.
about.description2: With years of experience in industrial automation and deep understanding of liquor production processes, we help distilleries optimize their operations while maintaining the highest quality standards.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions for modern liquor production

monitoring.title: Real-Time Monitoring
monitoring.description: Monitor critical parameters like temperature, humidity, and pressure across all production stages with instant alerts and automated responses.

automation.title: Smart Automation
automation.description: Comprehensive automation suite including environmental controls, quality management, and predictive maintenance for optimal production efficiency.

analytics.title: Analytics & Integration
analytics.description: Advanced analytics, comprehensive reporting, and seamless ERP integration to facilitate audits, improve decision-making, and streamline operations.

plans.title: Choose Your Plan
plans.subtitle: Flexible subscription models to fit your production needs
plans.note: All plans include specialized hardware, installation, training, and ongoing support. Custom solutions available for unique requirements.

contact.title: Ready to Transform Your Production?
contact.subtitle: Contact us today to learn how WineSoft can optimize your liquor production processes.

form.name: Name
form.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.

footer.description: Smart monitoring solutions for the liquor production industry. Optimizing quality, efficiency, and compliance.
